Package com.cubeia.firebase.api.game.table

Interface Summary
ExtendedDetailsProvider Provides extended, game specific details for players and table.
Seat<T extends Player> Model of a seat at a Table.
Table Table is the interface towards the Firebase internal implementation of a table in the system.
TableGameState This object manages the game state for a single table.
TableInterceptor The Table Interceptor enables an easy hook for allowing/disallowing players to join/leave the table.
TableListener Listen to table events.
TableMetaData This interface contains the meta data of a table.
TablePlayerSet This is the interface to the collection of players currently associated with the table (seated).
TableScheduler This object manages scheduled actions for a particular table.
TableSeatingMap THis map contains references between players and their current seat at a particular table.
TableWatcherSet A set containing all players "watching" the current table.
TournamentTableListener  
 

Class Summary
GameSeat<T extends Player>  
InterceptionResponse Container/Value Object for TableInterceptor return values.
SeatRequest Value object containing information for a join seat request.
 

Enum Summary
TableType Enumeration of table types.
